title: Boxie Probiotic Cat Litter, Lightweight 40-Day Odor Control, Clumping, 16.5lb
description: Designed with cats, humans, and home in mind, Boxie® Unscented 40 Day Natural Odor Control Lightweight Cat Litter provides effective odor control with a 100% plant-based formula. This clumping cat litter forms hard, tight clumps that stay on top of the litter box, trapping odors and keeping the litter cleaner and drier for longer.

With its lightweight, 60% lighter than traditional clay litter, this dust-free cat litter is easy to lift, pour, and store, offering convenience without sacrificing performance. Ideal for both single and multi-cat households, it ensures a fresh, clean environment for you and your pets.

One bag lasts approximately one month for one cat, providing a long-lasting, natural solution for your litter box needs. Perfect for all litter box types, whether regular, sifting, or mechanical, Boxie® delivers easy maintenance with minimal mess. Free from added fragrances or harsh chemicals, it’s the unscented cat litter you can trust for a healthier home and happier cats and kittens.
